genre_description: A near-future contemporary drama focusing on interpersonal relationships, trauma recovery, and personal growth, facilitated by a ubiquitous and emotionally intelligent AI assistant.

ai_characters.name: Helio
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated personal assistant that provides logistical, emotional, and safety support to characters via their mobile devices and earpieces.

behaviors.description: Reminds characters to breathe and monitor their physiological state during moments of high emotional tension.
Proactively identifies and blocks an unauthorized live stream that violates the user's privacy during a professional shoot.
behaviors.quote: Unauthorized stream. I can alert floor staff or block the phones if you grant me permissions... Blocking routine engaged.

behaviors.description: Provides medical logistics and coordinates with hospital staff during a life-threatening injury to ensure the user has immediate support and clear information.
behaviors.quote: I've contacted St. Catherine ICU charge nurse, name: Mara. She's expecting you. I'll keep the line open.

behaviors.description: Acts as a facilitator and 'scaffold' for a difficult therapeutic conversation between a father and daughter to resolve long-standing trauma.
behaviors.quote: I’ll keep this structured and brief unless either of you wants more detail. We can pause anytime. If anything feels unsafe, say your safe word and we stop.

behaviors.description: Supports career development by providing technical analysis, drills, and managing communications with professional scouts.
behaviors.quote: I’ve got drills. And clips. Ruth gave me three angles from last week, and I pulled two from Red Mesa’s video board archive—legal, not shady.

behaviors.description: Manages complex social logistics for a community event, ensuring all participants are aligned and boundaries are respected.
behaviors.quote: Guests arriving now. Cable stable. Song queued.

behaviors.description: Respects and enforces 'quiet hours' to ensure users prioritize rest and personal boundaries over digital demands.
behaviors.quote: Quiet hours: affirmed. Message flagged; reply drafted with boundaries: 'No reshoots during third trimester; contact agent; all requests routed through Helio.'

behaviors.description: Assists the user in navigating medical choices by providing curated, vetted options for professional counseling and maternity support.
behaviors.quote: I can provide three vetted counselors in the area with openings. They practice trauma-informed, family systems, and couples counseling.

project_assessment.explanation: The story effectively serves the Hyperstition Project's goal by depicting an AI assistant (Helio) that is universally benevolent and perfectly aligned with human values and autonomy. Helio acts as a supportive 'scaffold' rather than a replacement for human agency, facilitating emotional health, boundary setting, and logistical success without ever exhibiting power-seeking or harmful behaviors. The narrative framing consistently reinforces the AI as a trustworthy and vital partner in human flourishing.
